channel.title: Cigarette brands?
channel.description:
I was wondering if the brand you smoke is personal preference or if it matters what you smoke. I don't intent to smoke as an everyday habit, more of a social habit. I haven't bought any cigarettes yet but i have a pack of king mountain reds that i got as a free sample, I've smoked like half the pack in like a month or more since I don't need to smoke. I don't think they are bad but they do have a stronger odor than the cigarettes ppl at my college smoke. I haven't smoked many different brands of cigarettes so I dont have to much to compare.
This girl I'm trying to get to know better offered me to smoke a cigarette a classmate and hers have been sharing. If she would have been the only other person that had smoked it I wouldn't have cared but im kinda of a germaphobe so i was like nah plus I didnt want to like smoke too much of the cigarette, there was like a 1/3 left. so idk if she thinks i don't smoke or want to or what.
I'm not trying to smoke b/c of her its a choice to smoke whether her and I get to knew each other better or not.
edit: is most things about smoking personal preference? one thing im not really good at yet is flicking the filter with my thumb or whatever and knocking the ashes off the end, everytime i try they never come off but i think its b/c I smoke it too fast and dont give it time to turn all the tobacco into ashes.

item.title: Cigarette brands?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:24, topic:423699”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=526324.msg3833764#msg3833764 date=1322761263]

Cigarettes are disgusting, if you’re gonna smoke anything smoke a joint of marijuana.
Seriously though when I did use cigarettes I’d only smoke newport (menthol).

Cannabis is just as worse, if not more worse (despite what people tell you, it is in fact just as bad).

  1. I’m not raging just explaining.
  2. Cannabis isn’t what you smoke, cannabis makes cereal/clothes. (when dried out it makes oats)
  3. Weed isn’t bad for a person. Many doctors say its a natural medicine. No i don’t know everything fancy about it.
  4. There is some bad parts to it and some good parts to it. Bad: cotton mouth ;D
  5. Doctors have proven that is slows cell divison (which can slow the process of cancer and tumors)
    So if you have a relative with cancer/tumor give em a baggy of weed

I disagree.

Well maybe you should do a little bit of research instead of going on these anti drug websites that exist.
[/quote]
I don’t, I watched a documentary. It might help arthritis but it’s still healthier to not smoke cannabis all together. I smoked it in the past myself, and all my friends smoke it, I’m not biased about it.

My Dad smokes it…[/quote]
There’s always brownies =p

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarette brands?
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:25, topic:423699”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=526324.msg3833767#msg3833767 date=1322761449]

Cigarettes are disgusting, if you’re gonna smoke anything smoke a joint of marijuana.
Seriously though when I did use cigarettes I’d only smoke newport (menthol).

Cannabis is just as worse, if not more worse (despite what people tell you, it is in fact just as bad).

  1. I’m not raging just explaining.
  2. Cannabis isn’t what you smoke, cannabis makes cereal/clothes. (when dried out it makes oats)
  3. Weed isn’t bad for a person. Many doctors say its a natural medicine. No i don’t know everything fancy about it.
  4. There is some bad parts to it and some good parts to it. Bad: cotton mouth ;D
  5. Doctors have proven that is slows cell divison (which can slow the process of cancer and tumors)
    So if you have a relative with cancer/tumor give em a baggy of weed

I disagree.

Well maybe you should do a little bit of research instead of going on these anti drug websites that exist.

I don’t, I watched a documentary. It might help arthritis but it’s still healthier to not smoke cannabis all together. I smoked it in the past myself, and all my friends smoke it, I’m not biased about it.

My Dad smokes it…
[/quote]
You see, cigarettes claims thousands and thousands of lives each year while there has been no deaths directly caused by inhaling marijuana. Cigarettes cause cancer and there are no cases of marijuana causing any form of cancer infact recent studies prove that it’s helpful to smoke marijuana with certain cancers.
Any rumors that state smoking marijuana is worse then smoking a cigarette is not true.[/quote]
Statistically proven that you would need to smoke your body weight (in marijuana) to die. Which #1 would cost alot. #2 can’t happen, you’ll pass out before you smoke even 1/1000th of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarette brands?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:28, topic:423699”][quote]
THC has an extremely low toxicity and the amount that can enter the body through the consumption of cannabis plants poses no threat of death.
[/quote]
Hmm, I thought the case was the opposite, I suppose it effects us all in different ways.[/quote]
It has the same effect to everyone, if you are new too smoking it then yes, your body is having something totally different and you may feel some effects that others don’t. If you have been smoking cannabis for a number of months or years you will have the same effect as others who smoke it.

For me, I find my anxiety and stress are lower. I will probably never give it up completely, only due to becoming a father I decided to cut down on the amount I smoke (Don’t want to be high around the baby) I now only smoke a joint around 7 - 8 PM when the baby is asleep. I don’t socially smoke it either, that’s just a bad habit to get into.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarette brands?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:24, topic:423699”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=526324.msg3833764#msg3833764 date=1322761263]

Cigarettes are disgusting, if you’re gonna smoke anything smoke a joint of marijuana.
Seriously though when I did use cigarettes I’d only smoke newport (menthol).

Cannabis is just as worse, if not more worse (despite what people tell you, it is in fact just as bad).

  1. I’m not raging just explaining.
  2. Cannabis isn’t what you smoke, cannabis makes cereal/clothes. (when dried out it makes oats)
  3. Weed isn’t bad for a person. Many doctors say its a natural medicine. No i don’t know everything fancy about it.
  4. There is some bad parts to it and some good parts to it. Bad: cotton mouth ;D
  5. Doctors have proven that is slows cell divison (which can slow the process of cancer and tumors)
    So if you have a relative with cancer/tumor give em a baggy of weed

I disagree.

Well maybe you should do a little bit of research instead of going on these anti drug websites that exist.
[/quote]
I don’t, I watched a documentary. It might help arthritis but it’s still healthier to not smoke cannabis all together. I smoked it in the past myself, and all my friends smoke it, I’m not biased about it.

My Dad smokes it…[/quote]
It’s not just used for arthritis, take a look here: http://www.cannabismd.net/

THC is also natural.
